description: the layout for your runic pillars
name: Runic Ritual

pages.text:
The Pillars must be set out as pictured with all the same colours.\
\
The pillars must have a different runic pattern on each of them. 
This can be achieved by right clicking with your Blackthorn Staff.
pages.title: Runic Sacrifice

pages.text: Killing a hostile mob on top of the runic core will complete the ritual.
